entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Waskesiu Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskesiu Lake 01:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -29.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %

Dewpoint: -33.3°C
Wind: NW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
